advancements.clayfarm.title: Clay Generator
advancements.copperfarm.descr: Collect 2 stacks of exposed copper, 2 stacks of weathered copper, and 2 stacks of oxidized copper
advancements.copperfarm.title: Copper Oxidizer
advancements.coralfarm.descr: Collect 4 stacks of any type of coral fan
advancements.coralfarm.title: Coral Farm

advancements.dripstonefarm.title: Dripstone Farm
advancements.drownedfarm.descr: Collect 4 stacks of rotten flesh, 4 stacks of copper ingots, and 1 trident
advancements.drownedfarm.title: Trident Farm
advancements.flowerfarm.descr: Collect 4 stacks of any type of flower
advancements.flowerfarm.title: Flower Farm

advancements.icefarm.title: Ice Generator
advancements.kelpfarm.title: Kelp Generator
advancements.lavachicken.descr: Collect 4 stacks of cooked chicken and 16 eggs
advancements.lavachicken.title: Chicken Cooker
advancements.leaffarm.descr: Collect 9 stacks of any type of leaves
advancements.leaffarm.title: Leaf Generator
advancements.magmacubefarm.title: Magma Farm

advancements.seapicklefarm.title: Sea Pickle Generator
advancements.snifferfarm.descr: Collect 4 stacks of torchflower seeds or 4 stacks of pitcher pods
advancements.snifferfarm.title: Sniffer Farm
advancements.snowfarm.title: Snow Generator
advancements.squidfarm.descr: Collect 4 stacks of ink sacs or 4 stacks of glow ink sacs

advancements.froglightfarm.descr: Collect 9 stacks of any type of froglight
advancements.ripeningmachine.title: Ripening Machine
advancements.ripeningmachine.descr: Collect 9 stacks of any type of ripening crop

advancements.mudfarm.title: mudfarm Farm
advancements.curcuitrevolution.title: Survival Curcuit Revolution
advancements.curcuitrevolution.descr: Efficiency is Minecraft's limit, not mine!
advancements.abovenether.title: Nether Roof
advancements.abovenether.descr: A vast place in Nether without anything

advancements.perimobfarm.descr: Grain 1 box of Bone and Rotten flesh

advancements.periwitherskel.descr: Grain 1 box of Wither Skeleton Skull

advancements.fastesttravel.descr: Use Ender Pearl Cannon to teleport into 10000m away

emi.automationera.iron.title: Iron Farm - Main Product: Iron
emi.automationera.iron.descr: Use zombies or pillagers to frighten villagers and spawn iron golems, then kill them to obtain iron ingots.
emi.automationera.stone.title: Cobblestone Generator - Main Product: Cobblestone
emi.automationera.stone.descr: Generate cobblestone using water and lava, then use a TNT duplicator to blast and collect cobblestone.
emi.automationera.wood.title: Tree Farm - Main Product: Logs
emi.automationera.wood.descr: Hold saplings in your main hand and bonemeal in your offhand. Use a TNT duplicator to blow up grown trees for logs.
emi.automationera.mob.title: Mob Farm - Main Mobs: Zombie/Skeleton/Creeper
emi.automationera.mob.descr: AFK 128 blocks above ground to limit the mob spawn area for high-efficiency mob farming.
emi.automationera.farm.title: Villager Auto Farm - Main Product: Carrots/Potatoes
emi.automationera.farm.descr: Use the villager food sharing mechanic to automatically harvest and collect crops.
emi.automationera.sand.title: Sand Duplicator - Product: All Falling Blocks
emi.automationera.sand.descr: Use the End portal entity bouncing method to duplicate and collect falling blocks (see Wiki for details).
emi.automationera.ice.title: Ice Farm - Product: Ice
emi.automationera.ice.descr: Create ice at high altitudes and manually mine it with Silk Touch tools.
emi.automationera.rail.title: Rail Duplicator - Product: Rails
emi.automationera.rail.descr: Duplicate rails using coral fans or use piston pushers to automatically farm rails.
emi.automationera.bonemeal.title: Bonemeal Farm - Main Product: Bonemeal/Moss
emi.automationera.bonemeal.descr: Use bonemeal to convert stone to moss, compost moss for bonemeal, and loop the process for positive feedback.
emi.automationera.sugarcane.title: Sugar Cane Farm - Product: Sugar Cane
emi.automationera.sugarcane.descr: See structure in image. Detect crop growth and push to harvest automatically.
emi.automationera.wart.title: Nether Wart Farm - Product: Nether Wart
emi.automationera.wart.descr: Manually plant nether wart and use water to harvest after it matures.
emi.automationera.bamboo.title: Bamboo Farm - Product: Bamboo
emi.automationera.bamboo.descr: See structure in image. Detect crop growth and push to harvest automatically.
emi.automationera.pork.title: Hoglin Farm - Main Product: Porkchop
emi.automationera.pork.descr: Use warped fungus to lure hoglins in crimson forests into a kill chamber.
emi.automationera.slime.title: Swamp Slime Farm - Product: Slimeballs
emi.automationera.slime.descr: AFK 128 blocks above to limit spawn area and maximize slime spawns. Use iron golems to lure slimes into kill chambers.
emi.automationera.enderman.title: Enderman Farm - Products: Ender Pearls/EXP
emi.automationera.enderman.descr: Use endermites to attract and anger endermen, leading them into a trap for killing.
emi.automationera.pigman.title: Pigman Farm - Main Product: Gold/EXP
emi.automationera.pigman.descr: Use player aggression to lure zombified piglins into kill chambers for gold and XP.
emi.automationera.cactus.title: Cactus Farm - Product: Cactus
emi.automationera.cactus.descr: Cacti grow next to fences and automatically break off upon growth for easy collection.
emi.automationera.trade.title: Villager Trading Hall
emi.automationera.trade.descr: Trap villagers in booths with magma blocks or campfires underneath for safe trading.
emi.automationera.melon.title: Melon Farm - Products: Melon/Pumpkin
emi.automationera.melon.descr: See structure in image. Detect crop growth and push to harvest.
emi.automationera.basalt.title: Basalt Farm - Product: Basalt
emi.automationera.basalt.descr: Generate basalt using ice, soul soil, and lava, then use TNT duplicators to blast and collect it.
emi.automationera.berry.title: Sweet Berry Farm - Product: Sweet Berries
emi.automationera.berry.descr: Use foxes to harvest sweet berries and minecarts to collect them automatically.
emi.automationera.blade.title: Blaze Farm - Product: Blaze Rods
emi.automationera.blade.descr: Use magma blocks to gather blazes and funnel them into a kill chamber.
emi.automationera.chicken.title: Chicken Cooker - Main Products: Eggs/Cooked Chicken
emi.automationera.chicken.descr: Automatically collect eggs; surplus chickens are cooked with lava or fire for cooked chicken.
emi.automationera.chorus.title: Chorus Fruit Farm - Product: Chorus Fruit
emi.automationera.chorus.descr: Use TNT duplicators to blast chorus flowers and move end stone to let chorus fruit drop.
emi.automationera.clay.title: Azalea Clay Farm - Main Products: Dirt/Mud/Clay
emi.automationera.clay.descr: Grow azalea to turn stone into dirt, use water bottles for mud, and dripstone to dry mud into clay.
emi.automationera.concrete.title: Concrete Converter - Product: Concrete
emi.automationera.concrete.descr: Hold an efficiency pickaxe in your main hand and concrete powder in your offhand, then use auto-clicking and water to instantly convert and mine concrete.
emi.automationera.copper.title: Copper Weathering Farm - Main Product: Oxidized Copper
emi.automationera.copper.descr: Expose copper blocks to air for natural oxidation, use pistons to move, then TNT for collection.
emi.automationera.cow.title: Cow Cooker - Main Product: Steak
emi.automationera.cow.descr: Breed cows in pens and kill adults for steak after calves grow up.
emi.automationera.creeper.title: Creeper Farm - Product: Gunpowder
emi.automationera.creeper.descr: Use trapdoors and carpets to filter and farm only creepers for gunpowder.
emi.automationera.cristal.title: Amethyst Farm - Product: Amethyst
emi.automationera.cristal.descr: Use redstone clocks to activate pistons and periodically harvest budding amethyst clusters.
emi.automationera.dripstone.title: Dripstone Farm - Product: Dripstone
emi.automationera.dripstone.descr: See structure in image. Detect dripstone growth and push to harvest.
emi.automationera.drone.title: Drowned Farm - Main Product: Copper Ingots
emi.automationera.drone.descr: Drowned sink in water streams and are concentrated into kill chambers for copper ingots.
emi.automationera.flower.title: Flower Farm - Product: Flowers
emi.automationera.flower.descr: Spawn more flower varieties in a flower forest biome and use water streams to collect them.
emi.automationera.froglight.title: Froglight Farm - Product: Froglights
emi.automationera.froglight.descr: Spawn magma cubes in basalt deltas, slow them with powdered snow or sweet berries, and let frogs eat the small cubes to create froglights.
emi.automationera.ghast.title: Ghast Farm - Main Product: Ghast Tears
emi.automationera.ghast.descr: Kill ghasts using magma blocks and wither roses, then collect tears with minecarts.
emi.automationera.honey.title: Bee Farm - Products: Honey and Honeycomb
emi.automationera.honey.descr: Automatically detect hive status and use dispensers to collect honey (with bottles) and honeycomb (with shears).
emi.automationera.hook.title: Tripwire Hook Farm - Product: Tripwire Hooks
emi.automationera.hook.descr: Build a specialized tripwire hook farm; trade with fletchers for emeralds in mid-game.
emi.automationera.kelp.title: Kelp Farm - Product: Kelp
emi.automationera.kelp.descr: See structure in image. Detect kelp growth and push to harvest automatically.
emi.automationera.leaf.title: Leaf Farm - Product: Leaves
emi.automationera.leaf.descr: Semi-automatically shear leaves. Waterlogged leaves are excellent blast-resistant building materials.
emi.automationera.magmacube.title: Magma Cube Farm
emi.automationera.magmacube.descr: Spawn magma cubes in basalt deltas and lure them with iron golems into kill chambers.
emi.automationera.marine.title: Guardian Farm - Main Product: Prismarine
emi.automationera.marine.descr: In one dimension, bubble columns push guardians to fall and die; in two dimensions, send them to the Nether for quick killing. Mainly for sea lanterns.
emi.automationera.mushroom.title: Mushroom Farm - Product: Mushrooms
emi.automationera.mushroom.descr: Detect mushroom spreading and push to harvest. Fully automatic but low efficiency per farm.
emi.automationera.mushroom2.title: Fungus Tree Farm - Product: Mushrooms
emi.automationera.mushroom2.descr: Hold mushrooms in main hand and bonemeal in offhand, then use a TNT duplicator to blast giant mushrooms.
emi.automationera.obsidian.title: Portal Obsidian Farm (1.21+)
emi.automationera.obsidian.descr: Let withers break Nether portals in 1.21+ to obtain obsidian.
emi.automationera.pickle.title: Sea Pickle Farm - Product: Sea Pickles
emi.automationera.pickle.descr: Bonemeal sea pickles and use pistons to break the block below, causing pickles to drop for collection.
emi.automationera.piglin.title: Piglin Bartering Hall - Main Products: Quartz/Obsidian/Enchanted Books/Potions
emi.automationera.piglin.descr: Stack massive numbers of piglins, throw gold ingots to start bartering and obtain various loot.
emi.automationera.rabbit.title: Cooked Rabbit Farm - Main Product: Rabbit's Foot
emi.automationera.rabbit.descr: Breed rabbits in pens; after they mature, kill them to collect rabbit's feet for brewing.
emi.automationera.raid.title: Raid Farm (Low Versions) - Main Products: Emeralds/Redstone/Totems of Undying
emi.automationera.raid.descr: Killing raid captains during raids without Bad Omen effect enables infinite raids for emeralds, redstone, and totems.
emi.automationera.ripend.title: Ripening Machine
emi.automationera.ripend.descr: Semi-automatic bonemeal-powered ripening machine for crops.
emi.automationera.sheep.title: Wool Farm - Product: Wool
emi.automationera.sheep.descr: Automatically detect grass block state and shear sheep.
emi.automationera.shulker.title: Shulker Farm - Product: Shulker Shells
emi.automationera.shulker.descr: Use shulker bullets to duplicate shulkers, enabling automatic shulker shell production.
emi.automationera.sniffer.title: Sniffer Farm - Products: Torchflower/Pitcher Pod
emi.automationera.sniffer.descr: Sniffers automatically produce seeds, which are collected by hoppers.
emi.automationera.snow.title: Snow Farm - Product: Snowballs
emi.automationera.snow.descr: Semi-automatically use a shovel to collect snow blocks below snow golems.
emi.automationera.squid.title: Squid Farm - Main Product: Ink Sacs
emi.automationera.squid.descr: Spawn squids in rivers or ocean biomes, let them sink and gather for easy killing.
emi.automationera.string.title: String Farm - Product: String
emi.automationera.string.descr: See structure in image. Fastest early-game emerald trading method.
emi.automationera.turtle.title: Turtle Farm - Main Product: Turtle Eggs
emi.automationera.turtle.descr: Primarily used to collect turtle eggs.
emi.automationera.wheat.title: Wheat Farm - Main Product: Wheat
emi.automationera.wheat.descr: Fill villager inventories with seeds so they drop wheat for minecart collection.
emi.automationera.witch.title: Witch Farm - Main Product: Redstone
emi.automationera.witch.descr: Use witch huts to spawn and kill witches for redstone.
emi.automationera.wither.title: Wither Killer - Product: Nether Star
emi.automationera.wither.descr: Manually place soul sand to spawn the wither, then trap and kill it with obsidian.
emi.automationera.witherrose.title: Wither Rose Farm - Main Product: Wither Roses
emi.automationera.witherrose.descr: Let withers kill mobs to produce wither roses.
emi.automationera.witherskel.title: Wither Skeleton Farm
emi.automationera.witherskel.descr: Use soul sand and wither roses in Nether fortresses to spawn wither skeletons, then lure and kill them with iron golems.
emi.automationera.allay.title: Allay Sorter
emi.automationera.allay.descr: Use allay bound to a note block to throw collected designated items into a hopper.
emi.automationera.bat.title: Bat Farm
emi.automationera.bat.descr: AFK to let bats spawn in low areas and use piston worms to send them into the Nether portal.
emi.automationera.bedrock.title: Bedrock Breaker
emi.automationera.bedrock.descr: Uses special structures to break bedrock. See image for details.
emi.automationera.brew.title: Single-Item Brewer
emi.automationera.brew.descr: Place as many layers of hoppers & droppers above the structure as there are brewing steps.
emi.automationera.carpet.title: Carpet Duplicator
emi.automationera.carpet.descr: Three designs: slime-free, coral fan duplication, and single-core basic version.
emi.automationera.cat.title: Cat Farm
emi.automationera.cat.descr: Use village cats, attract them with rabbits, and send them to the Nether through portals.
emi.automationera.classify.title: Basic Sorter
emi.automationera.classify.descr: See image for structure; top hopper uses 41 of the sorted item + 4 different fillers.
emi.automationera.coral.title: Coral Farm - Coral/Seagrass
emi.automationera.coral.descr: Warm ocean biome, frequent bone mealing, collect with silk touch shears.
emi.automationera.disk.title: Disc Farm
emi.automationera.disk.descr: Use trapdoors to separate creepers; player AFKs while skeletons shoot creepers for discs.
emi.automationera.drainer.title: Drainer
emi.automationera.drainer.descr: Commonly used in world eaters to drain liquids.
emi.automationera.endstone.title: Endstone Farm
emi.automationera.endstone.descr: Reviving the dragon at the end altar generates new end stone. Repeat for mass production.
emi.automationera.fish.title: Fish Farm
emi.automationera.fish.descr: Fish spawn in ocean biomes and are gathered and killed.
emi.automationera.fishing.title: Fishing Farm
emi.automationera.fishing.descr: Bubble columns and boats trap the bobber; player right-clicks note block, shrieker triggers reel-in.
emi.automationera.goat.title: Goat Horn Farm
emi.automationera.goat.descr: Goats see mobs but are too tall and hit stone blocks, dropping their horns.
emi.automationera.head.title: Head Farm
emi.automationera.head.descr: Turn creepers into charged creepers during thunderstorms; let them kill mobs for heads.
emi.automationera.lantern.title: Carving Machine
emi.automationera.lava.title: Lava Farm
emi.automationera.lichen.title: Glow Lichen Farm
emi.automationera.lichen.descr: Grow glow lichen and collect with shears.
emi.automationera.load.title: Loader - Minecraft Style
emi.automationera.load.descr: Minecarts force-load chunks for a few seconds; use cactus to break carts in Nether and return to Overworld.
emi.automationera.mooshroom.title: Mooshroom Farm
emi.automationera.mooshroom.descr: AFK in mushroom island perimeter to spawn mooshrooms, which are pushed and killed by water.
emi.automationera.nylium.title: Nylium Farm - Warped/Crimson
emi.automationera.nylium.descr: Grow nether blocks with bone meal, collect with silk touch, toggle mode by lever on composter base.
emi.automationera.obsidian2.title: Obsidian Farm - End platform style
emi.automationera.obsidian2.descr: Destroy the End platform with a wither to collect obsidian.
emi.automationera.pack.title: Packager (Single Speed)
emi.automationera.pack.descr: Collect full shulker boxes, often used with high-efficiency machines.
emi.automationera.phantom.title: Phantom Farm
emi.automationera.phantom.descr: Trap phantoms with water, player kills them for drops.
emi.automationera.pig.title: Pig Farm
emi.automationera.pig.descr: Trap adult pigs with trapdoors; newly bred pigs are killed by lava.
emi.automationera.smelt.title: Smelter - Packager
emi.automationera.smelt.descr: Quickly smelt shulker boxes with lava to get their contents, often used with large machines.
emi.automationera.spider.title: Spider Farm
emi.automationera.spider.descr: Limit spawn height to 1 block for spiders and spawn mobs efficiently.
emi.automationera.stone2.title: Anti-auto Stone Farm
emi.automationera.stone2.descr: Lava and water create stone, which is mined with a silk touch pickaxe.
emi.automationera.stray.title: Stray Farm
emi.automationera.stray.descr: Convert skeleton spawner; use powdered snow to turn skeletons into strays.
emi.automationera.strip.title: Stripping Machine - Logs/Deepslate/Podzol
emi.automationera.strip.descr: Main hand holds tool, off hand holds target block; TNT breaks and water collects the drops.
emi.automationera.tbm.title: Tunnel Boring Machine
emi.automationera.tbm.descr: Forward-firing TNT duplicator, uses TNT to clear blocks ahead.
emi.automationera.tnt.title: TNT Duplicator
emi.automationera.tnt.descr: Four designs: two slime-free, coral fan duplication (top right), and coral fan launcher (bottom right).
emi.automationera.tnt3d.title: 3D Bomber
emi.automationera.tnt3d.descr: A TNT bomber that moves in three directions, composed of dropper, duplication core, and return module.
emi.automationera.unpack.title: Unpackager
emi.automationera.unpack.descr: When a shulker box is emptied, it is automatically replaced with a new one.
emi.automationera.vine.title: Vine Farm
emi.automationera.vine.descr: Four-level stair design for maximum yield; soul sand waterway slows and shears collect vines.
emi.automationera.warden.title: Warden Farm
emi.automationera.warden.descr: Trap wardens with slabs, lure with trapdoors, kill by entity cramming.
emi.automationera.worldeater.title: World Eater
emi.automationera.worldeater.descr: Run after digging and building anvil wall; usually consists of drainer and bomber, typically 17x17 chunks.
